content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: end_stone_brick_slab
inventory=[{"type": "nether_sprouts", "quantity": 44, "index": 10}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 4, "index": 14}, {"type": "vine", "quantity": 46, "index": 26}, {"type": "brown_mushroom_block", "quantity": 32, "index": 27}, {"type": "music_disc_mall", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}]
thought: I need to craft 4 end_stone_bricks, and I have enough end stone to do so. I will start by moving one end stone to the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: end_stone_brick_slab
inventory=[{"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "nether_sprouts", "quantity": 44, "index": 10}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 3, "index": 14}, {"type": "vine", "quantity": 46, "index": 26}, {"type": "brown_mushroom_block", "quantity": 32, "index": 27}, {"type": "music_disc_mall", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}]
thought: Next I will move another end stone to the crafting grid next to the first one.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: end_stone_brick_slab
inventory=[{"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "nether_sprouts", "quantity": 44, "index": 10}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 2, "index": 14}, {"type": "vine", "quantity": 46, "index": 26}, {"type": "brown_mushroom_block", "quantity": 32, "index": 27}, {"type": "music_disc_mall", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}]
thought: Next I will move another end stone to the crafting grid below the first one.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: end_stone_brick_slab
inventory=[{"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "nether_sprouts", "quantity": 44, "index": 10}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "vine", "quantity": 46, "index": 26}, {"type": "brown_mushroom_block", "quantity": 32, "index": 27}, {"type": "music_disc_mall", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}]
thought: Next I will move another end stone to the crafting grid next to the third one.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: end_stone_brick_slab
inventory=[{"type": "end_stone_bricks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "nether_sprouts", "quantity": 44, "index": 10}, {"type": "vine", "quantity": 46, "index": 26}, {"type": "brown_mushroom_block", "quantity": 32, "index": 27}, {"type": "music_disc_mall", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}]
thought: Now I have crafted the end stone bricks, I will move them to my inventory.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: end_stone_brick_slab
inventory=[{"type": "nether_sprouts", "quantity": 44, "index": 10}, {"type": "end_stone_bricks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "vine", "quantity": 46, "index": 26}, {"type": "brown_mushroom_block", "quantity": 32, "index": 27}, {"type": "music_disc_mall", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}]
thought: To craft end_stone_brick_slab, I need to place 3 end_stone_bricks in a row. Therefore, I will first move one end_stone_bricks from slot 11 to slot 1 in the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: end_stone_brick_slab
inventory=[{"type": "end_stone_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "nether_sprouts", "quantity": 44, "index": 10}, {"type": "end_stone_bricks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "vine", "quantity": 46, "index": 26}, {"type": "brown_mushroom_block", "quantity": 32, "index": 27}, {"type": "music_disc_mall", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}]
thought: I have already placed one end_stone_bricks in slot 1, so I will now place another end_stone_bricks in slot 2 (to the right of slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: end_stone_brick_slab
inventory=[{"type": "end_stone_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "end_stone_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "nether_sprouts", "quantity": 44, "index": 10}, {"type": "end_stone_bricks", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "vine", "quantity": 46, "index": 26}, {"type": "brown_mushroom_block", "quantity": 32, "index": 27}, {"type": "music_disc_mall", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}]
thought: I have already placed two end_stone_bricks in slots 1 and 2, so I will now place another end_stone_bricks in slot 3 (to the right of slot 2).
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 3 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: end_stone_brick_slab
inventory=[{"type": "end_stone_brick_slab", "quantity": 6, "index": 0}, {"type": "end_stone_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "end_stone_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "end_stone_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "nether_sprouts", "quantity": 44, "index": 10}, {"type": "end_stone_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "vine", "quantity": 46, "index": 26}, {"type": "brown_mushroom_block", "quantity": 32, "index": 27}, {"type": "music_disc_mall", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}]
thought: The end_stone_brick_slabs have been crafted, so I will move them from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 6
